data.title: Formula film – Full service production company
data.text:
Croatia – a pitoresque country of more than a thousand Mediterranean islands, rough mountain scenery, miles of untouched greenery, and modern architecture combined with post-socialistic and midle-european city quarters, and that’s just for starters.

That’s just some of the reasons Croatia is a country with a unique potential for shooting international feature films and commercials. Its unmatched diversity of locations and close proximity to European production centres combined with highly skilled and experienced crews, as well as production costs that are among the lowest in Europe, Croatia offers incoming productions a high-end production value. If you’re into that. And of course you are.

And most importantly, our understanding of the local business landscape and our thorough overview of the pool of available film professionals will provide you with the security that your production is getting the most out of its shoot in Croatia.

What can we do for you? Choose from the list of our services:

Location Scouting and Management

Crewing & Casting

Shooting Permits

Legal & Accounting Support

Budgeting

Access to Equipment in the Region (Camera, Grip, Lightning, Studios)

Access to regional Post-production Facilities

If you wish to find out more about filming in Croatia, or how to apply for local funding, the cash rebate program or a VAT refund, don’t hesitate to ask us about it, we’ll give you advice. We can also advise you on any other aspect of film production, from location scouting, through obtaining filming or work permits, to importing goods and renting equipment… You name it.

And if you are interested in finding out more about Croatia’s production incentive programme, from the actual application process, the potential eligibility of your project, the estimated turnaround time and rebate amount, please feel free to give us a call. Or send us an e-mail. We’ll be glad to help.

Croatia, one of the most beautiful Mediterranean countries in terms of locations, is film-friendly and easy to film in. It’s a small country that offers a great variety.

That variety of landscapes and climates offers crews an opportunity to film in locations extending from continental plains, through high mountains, to the Mediterranean coast, and all within a few hours drive.

So if you have a project for which you are seeking various captivating and production-friendly locations that are within in close range to each other, you’ve come to the right place. All you have to do is ask, and we will be more than happy to prepare for you a selection of location pictures suitable for your project.
